cards.html:
AlphaDream, the developer behind the beloved Mario & Luigi series, have worked on the series since the Game Boy Advance and they just might be working on a new entry for the Switch.

This information comes to us from a recruitment listing from the company stating they are looking for a 2D/3D graphic designer that includes Switch, mobile and PS4.

Perhaps AlphaDream plan on working on a new series as the listing also included PS4; or perhaps it’s a red herring?

 

But what do you think? Would you like to see a new Mario & Luigi game on the Switch? Let us know in the Comment section below.

Don’t forget to like our Facebook Page in order to get updated with every article we post, along with more Nintendo content. And hey, why not check out what Kimishima had to say about more games still to be announced for 2018?
